label: 三味線
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: A three-stringed banjo-like lute,usually played with a large plectrum, used in chamber music and to accompany jōruri, nagauta, and many other popular Edo-period song and narrative genres.［浄瑠璃、長唄、江戸］
